last_episode_to_air.name: Series Finale: Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Blanca discovers an HIV clinical trial is denying access to people of color she joins ACT UP in an effort to get Pray Tell the medication.

name: Pose
overview: A dance musical that explores the juxtaposition of several segments of 1980s life and society in New York: the ball culture world, the rise of the luxury Trump-era universe and the downtown social and literary scene.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: It's 1990, and even as Madonna's ballroom ode "Vogue" sweeps the nation, Blanca, Pray Tell and the House of Evangelista know life isn't always a ball.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season 2 flashes forward in time to 1990. On the heels of the ballroom community establishing itself in pop culture and going mainstream, the House of Evangelista is forced to reevaluate their goals. Meanwhile, the AIDS crisis worsens and the reaction from a group of activists reaches a fever pitch.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Blanca pursues her dream of becoming a house mother after receiving a devastating medical diagnosis, and Damon moves to New York City with aspirations of joining a dance company.

episodes.name: Access
episodes.overview: Blanca is denied access to a popular bar leading to a purposeful feud. Meanwhile, inexperienced Damon learns the truth about love and sex when he is asked on a date.

episodes.name: Giving and Receiving
episodes.overview: The House of Evangelista celebrates the holidays and prepares for the Snow Ball in spite of Angel’s lack of holiday spirit. Elektra contemplates undergoing an affirming medical procedure.

episodes.name: The Fever
episodes.overview: Candy’s insecurities about her appearance are heightened when she is criticized at a ball. Meanwhile, Blanca worries when Damon and Ricky have a medical scare that threatens to tear them apart.

episodes.name: Mother's Day
episodes.overview: Blanca is forced to reconnect with her estranged siblings after the death of her mother.

episodes.name: Love is the Message
episodes.overview: Pray Tell organizes a cabaret for the AIDS ward at a local hospital.

episodes.name: Pink Slip
episodes.overview: Blanca makes a startling revelation about Lil Papi that changes the House of Evangelista forever. Meanwhile, Elektra rethinks her means of survival when the House of Abundance is evicted from their apartment.

episodes.name: Mother of The Year
episodes.overview: The ultimate showdown takes places at the Princess Ball, when the House of Evangelista battles against the House of Ferocity and Mother of the Year is decided

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: It's 1990, and even as Madonna's ballroom ode "Vogue" sweeps the nation, Blanca, Pray Tell and the House of Evangelista know life isn't always a ball.

episodes.name: Acting Up
episodes.overview: Convinced Madonna's "Vogue" will lead to mainstream acceptance, Blanca encourages the House of Evangelista to follow their dreams despite putting her own on the backburner. Meanwhile, Pray Tell joins an activist organization fighting for the rights of HIV positive people.

episodes.name: Worth It
episodes.overview: Determined to be an example to her children, Blanca launches a business venture with unexpected results. Meanwhile, Ricky’s travels have unpredicted consequences for his relationship with Damon, and Elektra shocks the ballroom community with a bold move.

episodes.name: Butterfly/Cocoon
episodes.overview: A fatal mishap with a client leads Elektra to seek out the counsel of Blanca and Candy. Meanwhile, moving from friends to lovers proves to be a challenge for Angel and Lil Papi.

episodes.name: Never Knew Love Like This Before
episodes.overview: The Ballroom community is shaken to its core when a valued member is brutally attacked.

episodes.name: What Would Candy Do?
episodes.overview: Competition gets the best of Damon and Ricky as they audition for a spot on Madonna’s Blonde Ambition tour.

episodes.name: Love's in Need of Love Today
episodes.overview: After falling ill while organizing his annual AIDS Cabaret, PrayTell lands in the hospital leading to a series of unexpected visitors.

episodes.name: Blow
episodes.overview: The House of Evangelista plan a large prank to antagonize Frederica. Meanwhile, Angel is introduced to the unsavory side of modeling

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.overview: Relationships are irreparably damaged when Damon reveals the secrets others have been hiding.

episodes.name: Life's a Beach
episodes.overview: With Blanca reeling from an unexpected loss, Elektra organizes a girls trip to the shore.

episodes.name: In My Heels
episodes.overview: After a medical set back, Blanca struggles to reassemble the House of Evangelista. Meanwhile, Pray Tell confronts old traumas when an exciting new category is proposed.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season 2 flashes forward in time to 1990. On the heels of the ballroom community establishing itself in pop culture and going mainstream, the House of Evangelista is forced to reevaluate their goals. Meanwhile, the AIDS crisis worsens and the reaction from a group of activists reaches a fever pitch.

episodes.name: On The Run
episodes.overview: 1994. With the AIDS epidemic reaching fever pitch, Blanca finds purpose working as a nurse's aide, but Blanca's history with a new patient leads to a challenging ordeal. Lemar shakes up the community when he becomes father to the unruly House of Khan.

episodes.name: Intervention
episodes.overview: When Pray Tell's alcoholism leads to expected consequences, Blanca stages a much-needed intervention. Meanwhile, Blanca nervously prepares to meet Christopher's parents.

episodes.name: The Trunk
episodes.overview: After she is unjustly arrested, Elektra convinces Blanca to aid in disposing of the trunk in her closet before law enforcement finds it.

episodes.name: Take Me To Church
episodes.overview: After a startling health update, Pray Tell returns home to reconnect with his birth family.

episodes.name: Something Borrowed, Something Blue
episodes.overview: A visit from an old friend complicates Angel and Papi's wedding plans. Meanwhile, Elektra expands her business with the help of her new, shady, associates.

episodes.name: Something Old, Something New
episodes.overview: While the dust settles on their unforeseen life change, Papi adjusts to being a guardian and Angel seeks guidance from an unexpected source

episodes.name: Series Finale: Part 1
episodes.overview: When Blanca discovers an HIV clinical trial is denying access to people of color she joins ACT UP in an effort to get Pray Tell the medication

episodes.name: Series Finale: Part 2
episodes.overview: When Blanca discovers an HIV clinical trial is denying access to people of color she joins ACT UP in an effort to get Pray Tell the medication.
